title: Developing Critical Thinking Skills for Accounting Education: Simulation Learning Based on the Reflective Judgment Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Accounting Principles and Secondary Education Experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation environment for preservice teachers to learn how to teach critical thinking in accounting education, using simplified smartphone-based VR equipment.

learning_goals: Learners can structure decision-making processes by applying a reflective judgment model in accounting case analyses.
Learners can solve complex accounting problems in VR simulations with over 80% accuracy using critical thinking.
Learners can propose strategies to integrate critical thinking elements into accounting education design through peer feedback and self-reflection.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
